body:
Good catch! 

Do the test here pass both before and after this change, even with gradient_checker? 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/relu_op_test.py#L255

If so, we need to patch up the test coverage hole. Thanks!
